shows.title: Greenbelt Originals
shows.desc: Hosted by singer-songwriter and former festival manager Andy Thornton, this show delves back in time to re-kindle an old flame or two. This year, Andy welcomes back to Greenbelt Ivor Novello award-winning singer-songwriter Iain Archer and his soulmate and harmoniser for life Miriam Kaufman. Plus the enigmatic The Dan The D (aka Dan Donovan). This promises to be very special.

shows.title: The Dan The D aka Dan Donovan
shows.desc: Like your rock dark and dirty, with echoes of Julian Cope and PJ Harvey? Then Dan’s your man. Over a 30-year career The Dan The D AKA Dan Donovan has recorded 13 albums with styles ranging from grungy to stripped-down to swamp-rocky. His latest recording was made with members of Snow Patrol and the Eagles of Death Metal.
